## ğŸ” Review Checklist

### **Quality**
- [ ] Content aligns with ColoredCow Voice (Craft + Culture + Reliability + Innovation)  
- [ ] No duplication with existing content  
- [ ] Sources/examples verified  
- [ ] Tone is authentic, honest, transparent  

### **Structure**
- [ ] Correct folder structure  
- [ ] Metadata front-matter complete  
- [ ] Naming conventions followed  

### **Accuracy**
- [ ] Facts cross-verified  
- [ ] Examples/case references accurate  
- [ ] No confidential client data exposed
